_BE_inc.description: The taxpayer's taxable income changes according to the product of this parameter and the dollar change (assuming no behavioral responses) in after tax income caused by the reform.

_BE_sub.description: The taxpayer's taxable income changes according to the product of this parameter, the taxpayer's taxable income before the policy change, and the proportional (not percentage) change in the after tax rate (1-MTR) on taxpayer earnings caused by the reform.

_BE_CG_per.description: Defined as proportional change of long-term capital gains divided by proportional change of after tax rate (1-MTR) on long-term capital gains caused by the reform. Usually positive.
